snippet: With an eye toward sports psychology concepts and quantitative analysis that attempts to identify factors that are as independent from one another as possible, five key statistical factors were identified that help predict Super Bowl winners.
abstract: With an eye toward sports psychology concepts and quantitative analysis that attempts to identify factors that are as independent from one another as possible, five key statistical factors were identified that help predict Super Bowl winners.

byline.original: By CARLTON J. CHIN and JAY P. GRANAT

lead_paragraph: Carlton Chin, a fund manager, and Jay Granat, psychotherapist, are authors of "Who Will Win the Big Game? A Psychological & Mathematical Method." They have previously written about the World Series and the N.C.A.A. men's basketball tournament, Super Bowl 44 and Super Bowl 45.

headline.main: Keeping Score: Championship Factors for Giants and Patriots
